clinical_study.brief_title: DeepView SnapShot Portable (DV-SSP): Device Training Study
clinical_study.official_title: DeepView SnapShot Portable (DV-SSP): Device Training Study

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to continue development and validation of an algorithm for burn healing assessment by the Spectral MD DeepView device and provide burn healing potential assessment.

primary_outcome.measure: Predict area of severe burn, using measurement tools such as the Pearson Correlation Coefficient
primary_outcome.description: Test that the Burn Segmentation Algorithm's predicted severe burn area (i.e., deep second degree and third degree) within an image of a burn injury, will be equivalent to the true area of severe burn as determined by the expert panel. The analysis for this study would only include data obtained from participants in the study.

arm_group.description: An initial imaging with the DV-SSP would be completed at the Study Site within 72 hours of suffering a thermal burn injury.

intervention.description: DV-SSP assistive imaging to collect observational data

study_pop.textblock: Subjects enrolled in this study will be recruited at the designated Study Site within 72 hours of suffering a thermal burn injury. Adult and pediatric Subjects with burns from one or more of the defined burn severities will be enrolled. All Subjects must meet the specified inclusion criteria.
